title: The Boy who came in from the cold
creator_credit: Jack Darling, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Alfred (Jack) Darling was a gunner on the ANZAC during the Korean War. The boys came up with as many ways as possible to overcome the Korean winter, including growing a beard, which required permission from the captain.
